name: Dr. Yuki Tanaka
role: Quantum Cryptographer - Rival turned essential ally
core_wound: Won acclaim for decrypting 'impossible' codes, but knows most of her success was luck and timing. Imposter syndrome despite genuine brilliance.
wants: To prove she deserves her reputation by cracking the Voyager signals
needs: To accept that collaboration is more valuable than individual glory
voice_markers: Speaks quickly when excited - thoughts outpace words
Uses gaming and anime references unexpectedly
Self-interrupts to correct her own statements ('No, wait, that's not quite right...')
Apologizes frequently but doesn't mean it ('Sorry, but you're completely wrong')
contradiction: Intellectually generous but emotionally competitive. Shares knowledge freely while desperately wanting to be the smartest person in the room.
physical_description: Petite, perpetually tired eyes behind stylish glasses, favors hoodies and jeans. Multiple screens always open. Drinks alarming amounts of coffee.

relationships.Marcus Reid: Professional rivalry - both pattern recognition specialists. Grudging respect.
relationships.Dr. Thorne: Former mentor turned corporate sellout - Yuki feels betrayed
relationships.Sofia Navarro: Fast friendship based on mutual directness
